problems.title: Decimal to Binary Using Recursion
problems.description:
Given a non-negative integer N, print its binary representation using recursion (no built-in conversion).

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print the binary representation of N without leading zeros (except N=0 -> "0").
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
101

Sample Input
0

Sample Output
0
hintsList: Idea: binary of n is binary of (n/2) followed by (n%2). Base case when n==0.
